    Query DSL for query predicates.

    • Method Detail

      • matchesAll

        public static QueryOptions matchesAll()
        Factory method that builds a default QueryOptions that has no predicate and no pagination set (i.e. all results).
        Returns:
        default QueryOptions

      • matches

        public static QueryOptions matches(QueryPredicate queryPredicate)
        Factory method that builds the options with the given QueryPredicate.
        Parameters:
        queryPredicate - the query conditions.
        Returns:
        options with a given predicate.

      • id

        public static QueryOptions id(java.lang.String modelId)
        Factory method that builds the options with a predicate matching the model id and the pagination set to the first result only.
        Parameters:
        modelId - model identifier.
        Returns:
        options with proper predicate and pagination to match a model by its id.

      • paginated

        Factory method that builds the options with the given QueryPaginationInput.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        options with the given sortBy fields.

      • sorted

        public static QueryOptions sorted(QuerySortBy... sortBy)
        Factory method that builds the options with the given QuerySortBy arguments.
        Parameters:
        sortBy - a varargs list of QuerySortBy options, in the order in which they are to be applied.
        Returns:
        options with the given sortBy fields.
